title: ‘You Can’t Hear Yourself Scream’: Youngest Rider Carys Lloyd Survives Hellish Debut in Paris-Roubaix Femmes
content:
British rider makes debut in the 'Hell of the North' at just 18 years of age, gaining experience for future seasons.

Read the full article at ‘You Can’t Hear Yourself Scream’: Youngest Rider Carys Lloyd Survives Hellish Debut in Paris-Roubaix Femmes on Velo.
author: sstokes
